title: adding_db_support
text: Add driver supported_drivers vector supported_drivers() function. Name package contains driver functions need. end-users don’t package installed trying connect DBtype prompted install . use CRAN packages please! Add user-facing UI utils_database_get_driver_specific_config_properties function. need new params arent already config_list function returns, make sure add default property (e.g. NULL used drivers). Take read function - hopefully need insert new code pretty obvious new config properties added: edit utils_database_write_yaml() - adding new args added configuration variables. edit call utils_database_write_yaml() utils_database_get_or_set_config function pass values provided user function actually writes config yaml. Add else entry bottom easydb_connect creates connection object (usually using DBI::dbConnect can function. use config$<config_var> acccess yaml config fields creds$username creds$password access user creds cred manager. Store connection object var connection (function return user). Add driver packages list Suggests DESCRIPTION file Add example usage readme

what: Easily Connect to Common Types of Databases
title: Easily Connect to Common Types of Databases
text: goal easydb simplify process connecting databases using R

title: Easily Connect to Common Types of Databases
text: Install CRAN can install development version easydb like :

title: Easily Connect to Common Types of Databases
code: library(easydb)  # Initialise a config file at '~/.easydb' easydb_init(config_file = '~/.easydb')  # sqlite sqlitedb <- system.file(package="easydb", "testdbs/mtcars.sqlite") sqlite_connection <- easydb_connect(sqlitedb, config_file = '~/.easydb')  # mysql # Example: connect to the public rfam mysql database # # See here for connection configuration:  # https://docs.rfam.org/en/latest/database.html rfam_connection <- easydb_connect(dbname = "Rfam", config_file = '~/.easydb')   # postgresql # Example: Connect to public RNAcentral postgres database # # See here for connection configuration:  # https://rnacentral.org/help/public-database rna_central_connection <- easydb_connect(dbname = 'pfmegrnargs', config_file = '~/.easydb')   # Don't forget to disconnect from databases when you finish! easydb_disconnect(sqlite_connection) easydb_disconnect(rna_central_connection) easydb_disconnect(rfam_connection)

title: Easily Connect to Common Types of Databases
text: ’ve finished working database, best disconnect db using easydb_disconnect(connection_object)

title: Easily Connect to Common Types of Databases
text: need store configuration details file somewhere disk. can choose . common practice create hidden file home directory. ’ll create config file: ~/.easydb needs done .

title: Easily Connect to Common Types of Databases
text: Connect databases: easydb_connect('database_name', '~/.easydb')

title: Easily Connect to Common Types of Databases
text: Disconnect databases: easydb_disconnect(connection)

title: Easily Connect to Common Types of Databases
text: first time try connect database, may answer questions database (depending database type ’re connecting ). ’ve setup configuration, re-enter host/port/creds unless set argument from_scratch = TRUE. argument delete existing configuration credentials given database prompt supply updated information.

title: Easily Connect to Common Types of Databases
Easily Connect to Common Types of Databases
text: Database configurations (host, port, driver, etc) stored configuration file created user-specified location (recommend ~/.easydb). Credentials stored separately operating systems credential store. powered keyring. ’re linux may need install secret service library. See readme details

code: path_to_config = tempfile() easydb_available_databases(path_to_config) #> ! No config file found at /tmp/RtmpBS8FEs/file2df01600754e. To create one, use #>   `easydb_init('/tmp/RtmpBS8FEs/file2df01600754e')`

title: Easy Database Connection — easydb_connect
text: Easily connect database. connecting database first time, prompted connection details. Configuration details stored user-specified 'configuration file'. next time run command, config details automatically retreived config file. usernames passwords stored system credential manager (-disk)

title: Easy Database Connection — easydb_connect
text: dbname name database (string) config_file path yaml file containing configuration information databases (port, host, etc. ) (string) from_scratch delete current config / credentials databases supplied name start ? (logical)

title: Easy Database Connection — easydb_connect
text: connection database (connection)

title: Easy Database Connection — easydb_connect
code: if(interactive()) {    # Choose config file path   # Do NOT use tempfile in practice.   # Instead, choose a fixed location such as '~/.easydb'   config <- tempfile('.example_config')    # Initialise config file   easydb_init(config)    # Connect to SQLite database   path_to_db <- system.file(package = 'easydb', 'testdbs/mtcars.sqlite')   con <- easydb_connect(dbname = path_to_db, config_file = config)    # Disconnect from database when finished   easydb_disconnect(con) }

title: Disconnect from database — easydb_disconnect
text: Simple wrapper around [DBI::dbDisconnect()]

title: Disconnect from database — easydb_disconnect
text: connection coneection generated [easydb_connect]

title: Disconnect from database — easydb_disconnect
text: Invisibly returns TRUE

title: Disconnect from database — easydb_disconnect
code: if(interactive()) {    # Choose config file path   # Do NOT use tempfile in practice.   # Instead, choose a fixed location such as '~/.easydb'   config <- tempfile('.example_config')    # Initialise config file   easydb_init(config)    # Connect to SQLite database   path_to_db <- system.file(package = 'easydb', 'testdbs/mtcars.sqlite')   con <- easydb_connect(dbname = path_to_db, config_file = config)    # Disconnect from database when finished   easydb_disconnect(con) }

title: Write database yaml — utils_database_write_yaml
text: dbname name database driver name driver creds_required credentials (username/password) required database (flag) port database port host database host ssl_cert path ssl certificate (string) ssl_key path ssl key (string) ssl_ca path ssl CA certificate (string) file config file located (produced already exist) append config file appended overwritten? Defualts append. change unless know
